title: French onion soup with Cognac
ingredients: ['70g butter', '850g chopped onions', '1 clove garlic, crushed', '1 teaspoon brown sugar', '1.4L beef stock', '150ml dry white wine', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '3 tablespoons Cognac', '1 loaf French bread, sliced into rounds', '225g Gruyere cheese']
